name: API testing
model:
# PICT model file for API testing

Method: GET, POST, PUT, DELETE
Auth: None, OAuth PKCE, OAuth Client Credentials
ContentType: application/json, application/xml, text/plain
Payload: Empty, Valid, Invalid

# Constraints
IF [Method] = "GET" THEN [Payload] = "Empty" OR [Payload] = "Valid";

name: Web application testing
model:
Browser: Chrome, Firefox, Edge
OS: Windows, macOS, Linux
Network: 4G, 5G, Wired, Wi-Fi
Authentication: OAuth, SAML, Entra

name: Disk partitioning
model:
Type:          Single, Span, Stripe, Mirror, RAID-5
Size:          10, 100, 500, 1000, 5000, 10000, 40000
Format method: Quick, Slow
File system:   FAT, FAT32, NTFS
Cluster size:  512, 1024, 2048, 4096, 8192, 16384, 32768, 65536
Compression:   On, Off

name: Weighting
model:
#
# Letâ€™s focus on primary partitions formatted with NTFS
#

Type:           Primary (10), Logical, Single, Span, Stripe, Mirror, RAID-5
Format method:  quick, slow
File system:    FAT, FAT32, NTFS (10)

name: Function call with negative test cases
model:
#
# Simplified strncpy, just to show how negative test generation works
# ~ denotes negative (aka invalid) values of a parameter, there wille
# be only one such value in any given test case
#
Src:  1B, 10B, ~nalloc, ~null
Dst:  1B, 10B, ~nalloc, ~null
Size: 1, 2, 0, ~-1
